message: Am I... inside my mind?
I stare in awe at the world around me.
Images of myself are projected all over the dome-like sky.
It looks kind of the Rhyme field, but not quite.
My first guess was only half right. This place is not entirely mine.
I think... this place belongs to Ren.
I turn, and there he is.
...In human form.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ren!"
He answers me with a silent glare.
His body has changed. The bug's doing, I'm sure. Parts of him look corrupted, somehow; his arm is a twisted, grotesque mass.
It hurts to see him this way.
Why... Why didn't I help him sooner?
Before he ended up like this...
Just as I open my mouth to speak again, Ren launches himself at me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ugh!"
I roll to the side, barely avoiding his attack.
As I start to get up, Ren slashes at me with blades that extend from his arms.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ngh!"
I manage to dodge the blades, but his attacks keep coming. He's not holding back.
Reaching the limit of my ability to evade, I try to deflect his blows with my fists.
The force of his attacks numbs me to the bone. This is real. Ren's trying to kill me.
His eyes are cold and empty.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I'm sorry."
The words just fall from my mouth.
An instant later, Ren knocks me away.
I hit the ground hard.
Ren approaches to finish me off.
Ren...
The pain, the danger―none of that matters. Ren has lost himself... and that hurts more than anything.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Ren, I'm sorry. I know you're suffering."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm sorry I never realized... I'm sorry I never understood."
Fighting through the pain, I stand and face him.

name: 蒼葉
message: "But I get it now. I remember who you are. Ren... you were always inside me. Always watching over me."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But I took advantage of you. Of your kindness. And for that, I'm sorry."
I take a step. Ren snarls a warning.
At the same time, I hear an explosive crack, and sparks fill the air before me.
When I try to move forward, I find my path blocked by an invisible wall.
